title: Some study motivation for all y'alls first ESA
content: sone advice my senior gave me back when i was writing my first ESA

comments.body:
based on a true story /s

if u score low in an ESA, people will throw rocks at you on campus
Or as in recent adventures, beds

https://preview.redd.it/5v7y9h3w8sae1.png?width=123&format=png&auto=webp&s=ba89071f5f926e454aa57fc6ff388710e3002970

this is what will happen to you if you don't score above 50 in ESA
